document_data.name: Mosque of the Visionary Spring
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mosque of the Visionary Spring''' was a temple to [[Zann]] in the city of [[Rog'osto]] in [[1367 DR]] and one of the most attended temples in all of the city.{{AQ-time}}

Structure.Interior: Inside of this temple was a vast library that was open to the public.

document_data.Inhabitants: The [[priest]]s that inhabited this temple were usually very open and helpful to anyone that sought out information regarding Rog'osto or the [[Ruined Kingdoms]] region in general. However, this was only the case for those whose desire was driven by genuine curiosity, not selfish desire or greed.
